features.title: Features
features.section.title: Revolutionary Features
features.section.subtitle: Experience the next generation of image processing with features that redefine what's possible
features.list.batch.title: Quantum-Speed Batch Processing
features.list.batch.desc: Upload 10,000+ images instantly. Our parallel processing engine handles massive batches faster than you can blink.
features.list.universal.title: Universal Format Alchemy
features.list.universal.desc: Transform any image format into any other. WebP, AVIF, HEIC, PNG, JPEG - we speak them all fluently.
features.list.neural.title: Neural Compression Engine
features.list.neural.desc: AI-powered algorithms achieve impossible compression ratios while preserving pixel-perfect quality. Magic meets science.
features.list.preview.title: Crystal Ball Preview
features.list.preview.desc: See the future before it happens. Live quality comparisons, size predictions, and visual diff analysis in real-time.
features.list.teleport.title: Teleport Download System
features.list.teleport.desc: Instant downloads, smart ZIP packaging, and cloud sync ready. Your converted images arrive before you finish clicking.
features.list.mobile.title: Pocket-Sized Powerhouse
features.list.mobile.desc: Full desktop power in your pocket. Touch-optimized interface that works flawlessly on any device, anywhere.
